message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on this incredible item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $9000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to meeting you in the middle, Bob! I can offer you a deal for $10800. It's a great price for this amazing product, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit above it. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. Can you make it happen?
I'm getting close, Bob! I can offer you a deal for $10700. It's a great price for this amazing product, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can meet you at $10400. Can you make it happen?

I understand you're getting tired of negotiating, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you a deal for $10600. It's a great price for this amazing product, and I think you'll really love it.
